comment.brief: The ticks are along the horizontal/vertical axis for the chart. This is generally used for line and bar charts.
comment.full: The ticks are along the horizontal/vertical axis for the chart. This is generally used for line and bar charts.

comment.brief: The ticks are radial lines from the center to the edge. This is generally used for pie and spider charts.
comment.full: The ticks are radial lines from the center to the edge. This is generally used for pie and spider charts.

comment.brief: The ticks are radial lines from the center to the edge. This is generally used for pie and spider charts.
